clinical_study.official_title: Correlation Between Postoperative Cognitive Function and EEG Parameters in Elderly Patients Undergoing Non-cardiac Major Surgery : Multi-center, Prospective, Observational Study

brief_summary.textblock: In the elderly patients undergoing elective non-cardiac major surgery, the differences of EEG parameters between those with and without postoperative cognitive dysfunction were observed to determine the characteristic changes of EEG parameters related to postoperative cognitive dysfunction

primary_outcome.measure: The difference of delta wave miss rate between patients with or without cognitive dysfunction by 1 day after surgery
primary_outcome.time_frame: from end of surgery to 1 day after surgery
primary_outcome.description: The difference (OR) between the miss rate of delta wave in patients with and without cognitive function change 1 day after operation.

primary_outcome.measure: The difference of spindle miss rate between patients with or without cognitive dysfunction by 1day after surgery
primary_outcome.time_frame: from end of surgery to 1 day after surgery
primary_outcome.description: The difference (OR) between the miss rate of spindle in patients with and without cognitive function change 1 day after operation.
